description: This file defines a ProfileFragment class for an Android app, responsible for displaying user profile info and handling logout functionality. It interacts with a ViewModel to observe authentication tokens and initiates navigation to an authentication activity upon logout.

classes.name: ProfileFragment
classes.description: Fragment displaying user profile info with logout capability.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes views, observes token changes, and sets logout button behavior.
